channel.title: Daily Tech News Show
channel.itunes:author: Tom Merritt
channel.itunes:summary: Daily Tech News Show features host Tom Merrit and various guests discussing featured news stories from the world of tech.
channel.description: Daily Tech News Show features host Tom Merrit and various guests discussing featured news stories from the world of tech.

item.title: DTNS 2153 – The Beats goes On
item.itunes:summary: Veronica Belmont joins to chat about Beats Audio, 3D Printing and the sale of Intel’s OnCue. MP3 Multiple versions (ogg, video etc.) from Archive.org. Please SUBSCRIBE HERE. Big thanks to Dan Lueders for the music and Martin Bell for the opening theme! Big thanks to Mustafa A. from thepolarcat.com for the logo! Thanks to our […]

item.title: DTNS 2149 – Encrypt all the things
item.itunes:summary: Scott Johnson and Darren Kitchen join me to chat about the latest NSA revelations, the ultra-secure new Blackphone, and whether encryption and security have gone mainstream. MP3 Multiple versions (ogg, video etc.) from Archive.org. Please SUBSCRIBE HERE. Big thanks to Dan Lueders for the music and Martin Bell for the opening theme! Big thanks to Mustafa […]

item.title: DTNS 2148 – Is Net Neutrality Dead?
